projects.title: Notes & Quotes
projects.description: Over 2020, I wrote down quotes that close ones and I said throughout the year; quotes that inspired or struck a cord with me. I decided to create an Instagram account (@notes__and__quotes__) so that we can look back as a way of self-reflection, and to boost moral during the pandemic.

profile_positions.description:
Y-3 ADIDAS/BROADWICK STUDIO 
STYLIST 

- Styled mannequins with their Atelier collection for the reopening on their London flagship shop on Conduit Street. 

THE TWENTY TWO HOTEL
EVENT PRODUCER 

- Assisted with the production of a Wimbledon inspired event in the private members club. 

KARL LAGERFELD EMEA (LONDON)
LEAD VM PRODCER

- Lead the launch of the Cara Loves Karl Fall 2022 VM installation in their Regent Street flagship retail store. 

FIFA GLOBAL (LONDON) 
LEAD STYLIST 

- Styled the global FIFA World Cup 2022 Kids and Adults campaign for their new E-commerce website (launching soon). 

CALVIN KLEIN EMEA (REMOTE)
VM PRODUCER

- Executed the PF22, FA22 and PS23 visual merchandising guidelines using the 3D rendering software, Mockshop.
- Lead the Calvin Klein Jeans SP23 showroom execution, working closely with the CKJ Merchandising team and Creative Services.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Creative

profile_positions.description:
- Led end-to-end photoshoots and video production, taking charge of conceptualization, execution, and collaborating with key stakeholders to craft impactful communication materials.
- Designed and implemented optimized production timelines to enhance workflow efficiency for both internal and external teams.
- Effectively coordinated shoot locations, conducted site visits, facilitated studio bookings, managed catering arrangements, and handled permit filing for seamless production operations.
- Created storyboards, scripts and recorded voiceovers for video assets. 
- Assumed the role of the on-set producer during shoot days, skillfully overseeing all production requirements.
- Effectively handled production budgets of up to £100k, diligently processing all invoices in compliance with the finance team's invoice tool, SAP.
- Collaborated closely with graphic designers to enhance the design of internal VM communications, aligning with the new brand identity.
- Curated an extensive roster of creative freelancers and suppliers, encompassing graphic designers, animators, photographers, videographers, editors, stylists, and makeup artists, to support all forthcoming projects.
- Managed the post-production of all assets, from V1 stage to final selection. 
- Structured and organized assets systematically, proficiently arranging them on the company-wide portal, and VM App for convenient and widespread access. 
- Championed change and fostered innovation by conceptualizing and orchestrating the inaugural internal VM Virtual Experience event, leading to an increase in participation by over 183% compared to the previous year.
- Efficiently managed a team comprising 5 freelancer project coordinators and multiple 3rd party suppliers.
profile_positions.title: Creative Producer, VM

profile_positions.description:
- Executing the first ever Outlet 3D rendered digital guidelines using Visual Retailing Mockshop software.
- Co-leading the development of the internal Dashdock website and app alongside the Senior Manager, VM + Communications and the external vendor.
- Overseeing the design and creation of the monthly multi-channel newsletter.
- Co-leading the seasonal events through content writing, video production set-up and space set-up.
- Leading and training country VMs through European store openings, refits, store visits, the AV 360 Experience event, in-person workshops, and digital Virtual Experience events.
- Decision-making on campaign images for all European Outlet locations alongside the Campaign Manager.
- Supporting the Retail Merchandising team with the Colour Flow and Collection Building.
- Executing the HQ Adoption Meeting and influencing country buyers to ensure brand consistency across Europe, in collaboration with the Outlet Retail Merchandising team. 
- Influencing the Store Development and Store Concept Design teams with the creation of floor plans, new fixtures and display tools for new openings and refits.
- Leading the roll-out of the free-standing light boxes, digital screens, hanging underwear fixture, high-level POS slim-frames, prong sign holder, and new in-store and windows POS in all premium Outlet locations.
- Collaborating with the NY head office team with ongoing global projects such as commercial trials, VM Principles training tool and The Style Guide.
profile_positions.title: Junior Manager, Visual Merchandising - Outlet

profile_positions.description:
- Managing the seasonal VM guidelines shoots, working closely with external photographers, retouchers and freelance stylists.
- Co-leading the development of the internal Dashdock website and app alongside the Senior Manager, VM + Communications and the external vendor.
- Overseeing the design and creation of the monthly multi-channel newsletter.
- Co-leading the seasonal events through content writing, video production set-up and space set-up.
- Leading and training country VMs through European store openings, refits, store visits, the AV 360 Experience event, in-person workshops, and digital Virtual Experience events.
- Executing the HQ showroom set-ups and signing off European showrooms ensuring brand consistency, in collaboration with the Creative Services team.
- Influencing the Store Development and Store Concept Design teams with the creation of floor plans, new fixtures and display tools for new openings and refits.
- Collaborating with the NY head office team with ongoing global projects such as commercial trials, VM Principles training tool and The Style Guide.
profile_positions.title: Junior Manager, Visual Merchandising - Full Price

profile_positions.description:
- Co-ordinating the seasonal VM guidelines shoots, working closely with external photographers, retouchers and freelance stylists.
- Sorting and delivering a high volume image assets for all stakeholders to use.
- Writing clear and cohesive guidelines for the Full Price O&O, SIS and Outlet channels across all divisions, including seasonal VM Guidelines, VM Principles, and In-Season reactions; working closely with the in-house and external Graphic Designers.
- Overseeing the print production and delivery to all country head offices, ensuring costs are in line with budget, all whilst working on the digital evolution of all guidelines.
- Collaborating with Retail Merchandising and Marketing to ensure there is cohesive 360 story telling each season.
- Co-leading and training country VMs through European store openings, refits, Model Store trainings, seasonal workshops and store visits.
- Organising and implementing European Press Days, working collaboratively with the country Marketing teams.
- Developing and communicating bi-weekly Full Price and Outlet newsletters to all country VMs and HQ teams.
- Providing the country VM teams with ongoing constructive feedback via The VM + Windows App.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator, Visual Merchandising - Full Price

profile_positions.description:
- Creating clear and cohesive guidelines for the Full Price, SIS & Outlet across all division; CKJ, CKU, CKA and CK Menswear including seasonal VM Guidelines, Basic VM Guidelines/Principles, In Season Reactions.
- Development of VM Guidelines from concept through to design.
- Working closely with the divisions to create the content for the VM Guidelines, ensuring all teams are aligned to ensure content is correct to support the business from a commercial and directional stand point.
- Ensuring accurate and clear time lines are in place to support the delivery of the VM Guidelines on time for each season. Allowing for sign off process where needed.
- Managing the photo shoot of all VM Guidelines
- Creating the written content and managing the necessary translations for the VM Guidelines.
- Working closely with the Senior VM Manager and Graphic Designer to achieve the correct design aesthetic of each VM Guideline in line with each brand.
- Manage the production of the VM Guidelines to ensure the quality is high and costs are in line with budget.
- Support the prompt and timely delivery of the VM Guidelines to all Country Head Offices.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator, Visual Merchandising Guidelines

profile_positions.description:
- Supporting project management of all Windows + Creative department initiatives, covering VM + Windows guidelines, POS, display
tools, Sale and Switch-Out.
- Developing and communicating various department communications and training tools.
- Collating content for all internal communications.
- Creating photo recaps of all new store openings and seasonal window installations.
- Supporting the VM + Windows team with the guideline shoot preparation.
- Assisting the set-up of the seasonal VM + Windows events.
profile_positions.title: Intern, Windows & Creative Project Management

profile_positions.description:
- Conducting research based on lifestyle concepts and trends
- Looking at KPI’s and developing floor plans
- Maximizing the space and layout of the store
- Proven ability to make commercial decisions that make an impact.
- Working with the VM Manager & sales teams to achieve commercial goals.
- Supported store opening and training of staff members.
- Using available space to the best advantage
- Dressing mannequins and making use of creative lighting for window displays
- Create displays for new merchandise on a daily basis
- Replenishing stock on display and controlling stock room
- Carry out 'Comp Shops' to be in line with other leading high street competitors
- Serve customers with the best customer service on the shop floor and on the tills
- Involved in the New Look Press Day S/S 13 and S/S 14
- Training new Visual Merchandiser staff
- Involved with the set-up of the new concept store in Dungarvan and Glasgow
profile_positions.title: Visual Merchandiser

profile_positions.description:
- Conducting research based on lifestyle concepts and trends
- Developing floor plans
- Maximizing the space and layout of the store
- Using available space to the best advantage and replenishing stock on display
- Dressing mannequins and making use of creative lighting for window displays
- Create displays for new merchandise on a daily basis
- Training new visual and management staff
- Included on store opening and blitz team – Dublin and Oxford Street, London
profile_positions.title: Visual Merchandiser

profile_positions.description:
- Interpreted and implemented recommended visual merchandising guidelines 
- Responsible for replenishing the shop floor and finding alternatives for sell out lines
- Worked with Visual Merchandisers to develop the layout of the store
- Dressed windows and mannequins with new stock to ensure customer interest
- Worked with Sales Figures reports and Company/Store Best Sellers reports
- Assisted customers with queries
- Included on flagship store opening - Ilac Centre, Henry Street, Dublin 1.
profile_positions.title: Product Team

volunteer_experiences.description:
- Conceptualised the Elf Town community art project in Bayside, alongside the Creative Officer
- Built a content strategy for all social media platforms.
- Lead the execution of the Elf Town installation. 
- Elf Town was broadcasted on TV3's Ireland AM morning show.
